sense.gloss: laying the groundwork, behind-the-scenes maneuvering, consensus-building process
digging around the roots of a tree (before transplanting)

sdata.j: ↑大統領↑↓だいとうりょう↓は↑辞任↑↓じにん↓する↑前↑↓まえ↓にお↑金↑↓かね↓に↑困↑↓こま↓らないように↑根回↑↓|ねまわ↓し|した。
sdata.e: The president made certain that he lined his pockets before he resigned.
